scripts.upgrade-all: find packages -maxdepth 1 -mindepth 1 -type d -exec bash -c "cd '{}' && ncu -u" \; && yarn
scripts.clean-all: find packages -maxdepth 1 -mindepth 1 -type d -exec bash -c "cd '{}' && pwd && rm -rf dist" \;
scripts.build-all: find packages -maxdepth 1 -mindepth 1 -type d -exec bash -c "cd '{}' && pwd && yarn build" \;
scripts.publish-all: find packages -maxdepth 1 -mindepth 1 -type d -exec bash -c "cd '{}' && pwd && npm publish --access public" \;
